thread.title: Beijing’s Market Rescue Leaves China Stocks Stuck in the Doldrums - WSJ
thread.title_full: Beijing’s Market Rescue Leaves China Stocks Stuck in the Doldrums - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Beijing’s Market Rescue Leaves China Stocks Stuck in the Doldrums - WSJ
text:
Six weeks after the Chinese stock market hit a floor following a sustained selloff, Beijing can claim credit for halting the decline—but not much else.
The Chinese government, which some analysts estimate has spent hundreds of billions of yuan buying stocks to stop the crash, is now left with a market in the doldrums. Shares are languishing near their lows, trading volume is down by about 70% from a peak in June, and volatility has... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
